ComicInfo.Series: G.I. Joe: A Real American Hero
ComicInfo.Summary: Union of the Snake Part 4 of 6. The Newly-unmasked Cobra Commander is free , and has Destro and the Baroness in his crosshairs for their betrayal! Meanwhile, Cobra launches an all-out assault on the PIT, something that will leave an already-faltering Joe team in an even more vulnerable state. That is, until their all-new commanding officer steps in.
ComicInfo.Title: Union Of the Snake (Part 4)
